channel.title: How do i create skill scape emotes in my server?
channel.description: hey everyone i was just wondering on other servers i see the skills scape that comes runescape it self but how do i get them in please if your gonna answer make sense with it and if this is wrong i just want answers thats all. :) ;) :D :mad: :( :eek: :cool: :rolleyes: :P :o :confused: :| ;D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2009, 06:58:21 pm[/size][hr]the best answer gets like owner on my server i bee co owner lol im seriuos!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2009, 07:01:14 pm[/size][hr]my server has dragon claws but its hamachi but awsome it got its cilent so first answer with good answer gets owner other that trye hard get admins and mods

or 474, only on 503+.

item.title: How do i create skill scape emotes in my server?
item.dc:creator: @Christopher_L Christopher_L
item.description:
@Christopher_L wrote:

Well, I’m not sure, but I know that the new emote (skill emote) will have to be coded in your client’s .java files. Also, If you are wanting custom emotes , you will need to make them yourself(Not sure you can…ATM).

NOTE:(My Information posted above may be incorrect, forgive me if it is)

Off Topic: Nothing is required from you for my information(This goes for everyone else too). If you want to re-pay me for what I have posted above, Rep is always a ++ for me ^_^.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i create skill scape emotes in my server?

item.title: How do i create skill scape emotes in my server?
item.dc:creator: @Emchie Emchie
item.description:
@Emchie wrote:

I THINK its in your Client.java and ItemHandler.java. For example when you wear it and click on the SkillCape button in emotes tab, it will do something. Set this -SOMETHING- VIA your client.java . Search through the animations and see which ones you like, then add these animations to make it do what you chose when you click on SkillCape Emote.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i create skill scape emotes in my server?
